page.title: 15SANDWICK LOCAL POLITICS
page.content: The area is locally governed by Shetland Islands Council of which there are 25 members. The member for Sandwick is Mr Malcolm Bray, a pilot with Loganair. There are elections every 4 years to elect a member of local government for the area. There is a community council and these people meet once each month to advise the councillor on local matters. They are also elected once every four years. Shetland Islands Council allocates them about Â£5000 annually to spend in the area. The members are Mrs B.Smith, chairman, Mr A.Barclay, vice_chairman,Mr N.Martin, MrJ.Henderson, Mrs R.Goudie, Mrs B.Johnson, Mr D.Smith and Mr J.Moncrieff.Mrs R.Inkster is the secretary/treasurer. Mr George Smith is the local community worker.
